document.full_text: belarusian president alexander lukashenko ordered security forces on wednesday to question local "political actors" -- a reference to the opposition -- over a metro station bomb attack which killed 12 people.
document.title: belarus opposition to be quizzed over bomb: lukashenko
lines_and_colors: belarusian president alexander lukashenko ordered security forces on wednesday to question local "political actors" -- a reference to the opposition -- over a metro station bomb attack which killed 12 people.
